title: Serverless Microservices Communication with AWS Step Functions and .NET Lambda
description: Create a serverless blog processing system using AWS Step Functions to orchestrate multiple AWS Lambda functions for content creation, validation, image processing, and publishing

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to create a serverless blog processing system using AWS Step Functions to orchestrate multiple AWS Lambda functions. The pattern includes steps for content creation, validation, image processing, and publishing, implemented using AWS CDK with .NET.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions, including how to start a Step Functions execution, monitor its progress, and verify the output of published blog posts.

authors.name: Tejas Vora
authors.bio: Tejas Vora is a Senior Solutions Architect with Amazon Web Services.
